mapper.select: SELECT rut.department_id AS departmentId, rut.user_id AS userId FROM department_user_relation_t rut WHERE rut.department_id = #{departmentUserRelation.departmentId} and rut.user_id = #{departmentUserRelation.userId}

SELECT d.`id` AS id, d.`department_code` AS departmentCode, d.`department_name` AS departmentName, d.`is_exist_childen` AS isexistChilden, d.`parent_id` AS parentId, d.`department_level` AS departmentLevel, d.`creater_by` AS createrBy, d.`create_date` AS createDate, d.`last_update_by` AS lastupDateBy, d.`last_update_date` AS lastupDateDate FROM department_user_relation_t dut INNER JOIN department_t d ON d.`id` = dut.`department_id` INNER JOIN user_t u ON u.`id` = dut.`user_id` WHERE u.`id` = #{userInfo.id}
